title: HoP 189 - Subcontinental Drift - Philosophy in Islamic India
itunes:title: HoP 189 - Subcontinental Drift - Philosophy in Islamic India
description: Ideas spread to Mughal India from Iran, and prince Dārā Shikūh seeks to unite the wisdom of the Upanishads with the Koran.
